author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Combat Overview Trailer for Blades of Fire, a third-person action PG developed by MercurySteam. Players can get the rundown on the game's deep combat mechanics giving players the ability to pull off precision parries, finishers, and more with a variety of weapons to get the job done. Blades of Fire is launching on May 22 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Epic Games Store).
title: Blades of Fire - Official Combat Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Tech Test 2 Announcement Trailer for ARC Raiders, an upcoming third-person online action extraction shooter developed by Embark Studios. Players will explore and fight through a lethal future Earth to scavenge the dangerous surface for valuable loot while unraveling the secrets of the world and the machines that rule it. The Tech Test 2 will run from April 30 to May 4 on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) with sign-ups available now.
title: ARC Raiders - Official Tech Test 2 Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Release Date Trailer for Among Us 3D, a VR version of the action puzzle social deduction game developed by Innersloth. Players will complete tasks, decide who's the imposter, or engage in shenanigans in classic Among Us fashion. Among Us 3D is launching on May 6 for PC (Steam).
title: Among Us 3D - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Defy gravity in Squirrel with a Gun with a new update. Check out the latest Squirrel with a Gun trailer to see what to expect with this Gravity update, which brings the Relativity Bunker entry pod where you will receive an all-new cutting-edge weapon: the Gravity Gun. The update also features 5 new golden acorns to collect and the Nuclear fur skin. After receiving the Gravity Gun, three gravity gun dispensers will become available in each of the three neighborhood regions.

Unleash the raw power of physics with the Gravity Gun to maneuver new spaces and reach new heights in the neighborhood in this new Squirrel with a Gun update, available now.
title: Squirrel with a Gun - Official Gravity Update Trailer

author: IGN
description: Dive into the world of Autonomica (formerly known as Farm Folks) in this trailer for the upcoming open-world survival game. Autonomica is inspired by solarpunk aesthetics driven by farming and automation, exploration, and futuristic tech. Build automated farms, craft advanced machinery, and explore islands filled with mysteries, ghosts, challenges, and time-bending adventures. A Kickstarter campaign for Autonomica is available now. If you're interested, you can learn more about it here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/crytivogames/autonomica
title: Autonomica - Official Kickstarter Trailer (formerly known as Farm Folks)

author: IGN
description:
Check out The Life of Chuck trailer from the upcoming film starring Tom Hiddleston, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Karen Gillan, Jacob Tremblay, and Mark Hamill.

From the hearts and minds of Stephen King and Mike Flanagan comes The Life of Chuck, the extraordinary story of an ordinary man. This unforgettable, genre-bending tale celebrates the life of Charles 'Chuck' Krantz as he experiences the wonder of love, the heartbreak of loss, and the multitudes contained in all of us.

The Life of Chuck, directed by Mike Flanagan, opens in select cities on June 6, and everywhere on June 13, 2025.
title: The Life of Chuck - Official Trailer (2025) Tom Hiddleston,  Mark Hamill

author: IGN
description:
Get a peek at some Decadent gameplay in this teaser trailer for the upcoming story-driven FPS. Decadent will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S. A full gameplay reveal is coming on May 6, 2025.

You are John Lorn, a royal explorer and a veteran of the Great War, turned decadent occultist. As a result of a traumatic experience during one of your occult experiments, you become a host for a mysterious parasite. Traveling to the Arctic one last time, you follow the traces of a lost Miskatonic University expedition. As your courage and sanity are pushed to the limit, you must learn to walk the line between good and evil and discover just how much grief and suffering you are ready to cause to save someone you hold dear.

#Decadent #Gaming #Games
title: Decadent - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Leftovers KO! trailer for this upcoming Punch-Out-inspired, hand-drawn animated boxing game where you fight a bunch of leftovers. The Leftovers KO! trailer shows gameplay as you duke it out with your food foes. Leftovers KO! will be available on Nintendo Switch and Steam. You can learn more about Leftovers KO! and check out the demo on Steam, if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3169060/Leftovers_KO/

In Leftovers KO!, after a long day at work, you come home to find that your uneaten food has come to life—and it's here to beat you up... with its hands! Defeat them all and uncover the truth! 

Every leftover has a distinct fighting style, moveset, strengths, and weaknesses. Adapt, be quick, and turn them back into a pile of ingredients. Learn new moves, practice them in the training room, and use them in real battle to savor the victory. Why are leftovers all of the sudden fighting back? How is that even possible? Only one way to find out - beat' em up
title: Leftovers KO! - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a peek at the eldritch beasts of Beneath in this latest creepy trailer for the upcoming deep-sea survival horror adventure FPS game. Beneath is a part of the Lovecraftian Days Steam Fest from April 14 - 21. Beneath will be available on PC. Closed monthly playtest for Beneath will begin next month on May 15, 2025.

#Beneath #Gaming #IGN
title: Beneath - Official Lovecraftian Days Trailer

author: IGN
description:
OUT NOW on Steam!
On RuneScape’s forgotten continent of Ashenfall, dragons have awoken. Gather, build, skill, and craft to survive in this co-operative survival crafting game. Only by mastering survival and uncovering ancient secrets can you hope to slay the Dragon Queen—alone or with allies. RuneScape: Dragonwilds is available on Steam now!
title: Runescape Dragonwilds - Official Narrative Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Accountant 2 hits cinemas April 24th and to celebrate we’re looking back at five iconic onscreen sibling duos. Ben Affleck returns as Christian Wolff and he needs his estranged brother, and hitman for hire, Braxton ⁠– played by Jon Bernthal ⁠– to overcome a deadly threat. Here are five of the most memorable sibling duos from film, TV and games. Presented by The Accountant 2.

#TheAccountant #Movies #IGN
title: The Accountant 2: Five Badass Siblings To Rival Christian and Brax

author: IGN
description:
G-Rebels combines several things I dearly love: aviation, Blade Runner, and open-ended approaches to gameplay. This amalgam of design influences produces something that is curious, ambitious, and dripping with potential, but which I’m not sure has yet been tuned enough to find its footing. Previewed by Jared Petty.

#Gaming #GRebels #IGN
title: G-Rebels Is a Sci-Fi Flight Combat Game Where You Feel Like You’re Flying a Nissan Versa

author: IGN
description:
Watch the PC Launch Trailer for GTA 5 Enhanced (Grand Theft Auto V), a new and improved version of the hit third-person open-world action game developed by Rockstar Games. Players can experience GTA 5 with optimizations to improve the game experience and performance for modern PCs for free as an upgrade. GTA 5 Enhanced is packed with several technical improvements, including ray-traced shadows and reflections, PC-only features such as ray-traced ambient occlusion and global illumination, support for AMD FSR and NVIDIA DLSS, and more for both Story Mode and GTA Online. GTA 5 Enhanced (Grand Theft Auto V) is available now for PC.

#IGN #Gaming #GTA5
title: GTA 5 Enhanced (Grand Theft Auto V) - Official PC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Stand resolute in the chaos of battle. A heart that knows no fear shall carve a path through the Night's tide. Meet Raider in the latest Elden Ring Nightreign trailer for the upcoming standalone cooperative spin-off set in a world parallel to that of 2022’s Elden Ring. Elden Ring Nightreign launches on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox, and Steam on May 30, 2025.

#EldenRing #EldenRingNightreign #Gaming
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - Official Raider Character Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the King Arthur: Legion IX cinematic console release date trailer for the dark fantasy tactical turn-based RPG developed by Neocore Games. Players will cut their way through the realm of Avalon as the skilled Roman tribune Gaius Julius Mento after being granted a demonic legion. Make use of the game's deep turn-based mechanics and character-centric elements to gain the upper hand against the opposition. King Arthur: Legion IX is launching on May 6 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S alongside the game being available now for PC (Steam).

#KingArthur #Gaming #Games
title: King Arthur: Legion IX - Official Cinematic Console Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 trailer to see what's coming with the Trygon update, which brings a new PvE mission "Exfiltration" and the new Trygon enemy. The Inferno Pistol also makes its entry to the armory, along with two cosmetic DLCs: The Imperial Fists Champion Pack and the Space Wolves Chapter Pack. Additionally, several quality-of-life improvements were also added to the game. Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 is available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X|S.

#Warhammer40KSpaceMarine2 #TrygonUpdate #Gaming
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Official Trygon Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don’t miss the announcement trailer for the GeForce RTX 5060 Family GPUs including the GeForce RTX 5060 Ti and RTX 5060 developed by NVIDIA. Players will be able to access these low-cost cards powered by NVIDIA Blackwell and AI to bring enhanced image quality, high frame rate, and low latency to the latest games. GeForce RTX 5060 Ti and RTX 5060 both make use of DLSS 4 frame-generation technology and the suite of Blackwell features for players to enjoy. The GeForce RTX 5060 Ti launches on April 16th with the GeForce RTX 5060 and GeForce RTX 5060 laptops releasing in May.

Source: https://youtube.com/nvidia

#RTX5060 #RTX5060Ti #Gaming
title: GeForce RTX 5060 & RTX 5060 Ti - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get a teaser of tomorrow's new weapons showcase trailer for Mouse: P.I. For Hire, the upcoming black-and-white cartoon-esque first-person shooter, before the full weapons trailer tomorrow (Wednesday, April 16). This teaser shows off the Clean-D Automatic Turpentine Cleanser. More guns will be shown off in tomorrow's full trailer. Wishlist Mouse: P.I. For Hire on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2416450/MOUSE_PI_For_Hire/
title: Mouse: P.I. For Hire - Official Weapons Teaser

author: IGN
description:
Enjoy 11 minutes of new Militsioner gameplay from the upcoming first-person escape simulator where you'll flatter, upset, piss off, or even romance a gigantic, Galactus-sized police officer who towers over your town. Wishlist Militsioner on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1373530/Militsioner/

#Gaming #Militsioner #IGN
title: Militsioner: 11 Minutes of Exclusive Giant-Cop-Dodging Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Ten convicts are promised freedom in exchange for defending a small town in feudal Japan. Tasked with holding a fortress against encroaching government forces, they fight with the desperation of men with nothing to lose. 

But when the officials who recruited them renege on their promise, the warriors realize they’ve been used as pawns in a larger scheme. Betrayed and outnumbered, they must forge their own fate or die trying.

Award-winning director Shiraishi Kazuya (The Blood of Wolves, The Devil’s Path, Birds Without Names) combines impressive action sequences with a lavish production design for this big budget war drama​​ inspired by true events. 

11 Rebels stars Yamada Takayuki (Gintama, 12 Assassins), Nakano Taiga (Under the Open Sky), Onoe Ukon (Baragaki: Unbroken Samurai), Sayashi Riho (feature film debut), Sakumoto Takara (Rage), and Chihara Seiji (Hana).

The epic samurai historical thriller 11 Rebels debuts on 4K Ultra HD, Blu-ray and DVD June 10 from Well Go USA Entertainm
title: 11 Rebels - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Yamada Takayuki, Nakano Taiga

author: IGN
description: Introducing Dreadmoor, an upcoming first-person action-adventure/mystery set in a post-apocalyptic world – inspired by the 2023 hit Dredge – where you'll fish, explore, fight monsters, craft items, upgrade your boat, and deal with whatever unexpected mysteries befall you. Dreadmoor is being developed by Dream Dock, and you can wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3629430/DREADMOOR/
title: Dreadmoor - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
After a lot of testing and a healthy dose of stress, the party are readying for one last adventure to mark the end of an era. But something feels different… Check out the latest Baldur's Gate 3 animated short from Larian Studios in collaboration with Spud Gun Studios.

Credit: Spud Gun Studios.

Baldur's Gate 3 is available now on Xbox Series X/S, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and PC. Patch 8 for Baldur’s Gate 3 is available now.

#BaldursGate3 #Gaming #Games
title: Baldur’s Gate 3: The Final Patch - Animated Short

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Overwatch 2 trailer for a look at the brand new permanent Overwatch 2 game mode, Stadium. Battle it out in this best-of-seven, round-based mode where teamwork, strategy, and hero evolution determine who wins. See some Overwatch 2 Stadium gameplay in action in this new trailer.

Earn Stadium Cash to unlock game-changing abilities and take down high-value enemies marked with bounties to earn bonus cash. Stadium also features a standalone ranking system with season-exclusive rewards.

Overwatch 2 is free to play on PC and consoles. The Overwatch 2 Stadium mode arrives when Overwatch 2 Season 16 launches on April 22, 2025.

#Overwatch2 #Gaming #Games
title: Overwatch 2 - Official Stadium Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's a new look at gameplay and more from Worshippers of Cthulhu in this trailer for the dark city-building strategy game steeped in Lovecraftian horror. Worshippers of Cthulhu is out now in Steam Early Access, and version 1.0 will be available on May 22, 2025.

In Worshippers of Cthulhu, you are tasked with leading a cult dedicated to awakening Cthulhu. Your journey begins by establishing and managing cities across multiple islands. Efficient resource management and strategic decisions are key. Perform dark rituals to gain supernatural powers and explore mysterious lands for hidden resources. Conquer territories while deciding the fate of non-believers—convert or sacrifice them. Balance Cthulhu’s Patience with your cult’s Fanaticism to ensure survival and dominance in a constantly evolving environment.
title: Worshippers of Cthulhu - Official 1.0 Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Indy has arrived on PlayStation 5! In this video, we play through the first few missions of the game, captured on PS5 Pro in 4K 60fps. 

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle launches on PlayStation 5 (PS5) on April 17, with the early-access window starting on April 15 with the Premium Edition. The game is visually enhanced on PS5 Pro, running at a native 4K with global illumination ray tracing.

0:00 South America Intro
10:27 Marshall College Night
14:04 Marshall College Morning
21:50 Outside Vatican City
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: 35 Minutes of PS5 Pro Gameplay (4K 60fps)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the exclusive gameplay trailer for Cronos: The New Dawn, an upcoming sci-fi survival horror game from developer Bloober Team. Cronos: The New Dawn is a twisted time travel story set in an unforgiving post-apocalyptic future in 1980s Poland. Cronos: The New Dawn will be available on PC (Steam), PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S.

In Cronos: The New Dawn, take on the role of a Traveler, an agent of the enigmatic Collective with a mission to extract selected people who didn’t survive the apocalypse from the past. To complete the Collective’s mission, you will need to survive a deadly wasteland created by a cataclysmic event known as the Change, filled with monstrous abominations that will challenge players’ combat abilities.
title: Cronos: The New Dawn - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
title: Donkey Kong can beat his chest at any time with a shake of the controller! #switch2 #donkeykong #ign

author: IGN
description:
Get your first look at Hell Express, an upcoming four-player co-op isometric shooter where you play an armed guard in the Hell Express delivery company who shuttles cargo between the living world and Limbo. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3564490/Hell_Express/

#HellExpress #Gaming #IGN
title: Hell Express - Official Gameplay Trailer
